venue.name: NEGLAA/ New England Gallery of Latin American Art

item.description:
Let's meet at the Atlantic Works Gallery at 80 Border Street at 1:00. From there we can see some of the individual studios and listen to some of the music in the Cultural Exchange Center, also in that building.

From there we'll head to Zumix, and after that the New England Gallery of Latin American Art (NEGLAA). From there we can check out the beautifully renovated East Boston YMCA building and see their local artist exhibitions.

After all that let's go for a late lunch/ early dinner at el Rincón Limeño- Peruvian food!

See you there!





More information available on their website: http://www.eastboston...
item.how_to_find_us: You should be able to recognize me from my photo!
item.name: East Boston Open Studios 2008
